list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a bird of prey with broad rounded wings and a long tail, typically taking prey by surprise with a short chase.
a person who advocates an aggressive or warlike policy, especially in foreign affairs.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: severe limits were put on the peace plan by party hawks
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giới hạn nghiêm trọng đã được đưa vào kế hoạch hòa bình của Bên Hawks

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a plasterer's square board with a handle underneath for carrying plaster or mortar.
(of a person) hunt game with a trained hawk.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông đã dành buổi chiều Hawking

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a bird or dragonfly) hunt on the wing for food.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: swifts hawked low over the water
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Swifts Hawked thấp trên mặt nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: carry around and offer (goods) for sale, typically advertising them by shouting.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: street traders were hawking costume jewelry
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thương nhân đường phố là trang phục Hawking Trang phục

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he hawked and spat into the flames
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta diều hâu và nhổ vào ngọn lửa
